metadata.name: Joshua Davis

persona.name: Robert King
persona.role: Existing customer, franchise gym owner (2 locations)
persona.goal: Renew/renegotiate service terms and schedule a callback with sales
persona.context: Current contract nearing renewal; wants to avoid price increases; can approve purchase but wants options laid out

intent.name: Request Business Internet Quote & Callback
intent.description: A new business prospect wants pricing/plan info for business internet and to talk to sales.
intent.goal: Share business details and schedule a callback appointment with a sales agent.
intent.initialMessage: Hi, I’m setting up internet for my shop—can someone call me with pricing and options?

emotion.name: Impatient
emotion.description: Short, clipped messages; repeats questions; emphasizes urgency with “ASAP,” “now,” or “need this today.”

metadata.outcome: Appointment scheduled with agent for contract renewal and pricing discussion.

turns.content: Hi, I’m setting up internet for my shop—can someone call me with pricing and options? I need to talk to someone ASAP about plans and contracts, preferably today.
I can arrange a call with a Business Class agent. May I have your name and confirm this is for your shop’s business?

messages: I can arrange a call with a Business Class agent. May I have your name and confirm this is for your shop’s business?

turns.content:
Yeah, it’s for my business.  
Name’s Robert King, and it’s for my two franchise gym locations—both business service only.
Thanks, Robert. When would you like to schedule a call (date, time) and what’s your time zone?

messages: Thanks, Robert. When would you like to schedule a call (date, time) and what’s your time zone?

turns.content:
Soon as possible.  

Let’s do tomorrow at 10:30 AM in Eastern Time.
Great, you’re all set for January 14, 2026, 10:30 AM ET. You’ll get a text with the phone number to call about 5 minutes before your appointment. Anything else I can help with today?

messages: Great, you’re all set for January 14, 2026, 10:30 AM ET. You’ll get a text with the phone number to call about 5 minutes before your appointment. Anything else I can help with today?

turns.content: Okay, that works. Just make sure they’re ready to talk pricing and renewal options for both locations—I need to keep costs flat if possible.
